cancellationPolicies.label: Free Cancellation rates
cancellationPolicies.description: If you cancel your booking before 23:59 24th Nov 2025 (NZDT) your deposit will be refunded to your payment card. If you cancel after 23:59 24th Nov 2025 (NZDT) or in the event of a no-show, your deposit will not be refunded and the total of the first night's accommodation will be charged to your payment card, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information). Please note that cancellations must be made directly within your booking in My Account.

privates.name: Basic Single Private Shared Bathroom
privates.description: Private Room with 1 single bed, sleeps one person.
privates.labelDescription: FREE WiFi, Parking. Private single room. Room includes bedding, heater, desk, chair. Guest Communal bathrooms available in each Lodge. The Communal kitchen, TV lounge/dining area in adjacent building. $5 fee for Kitchen basket, refundable bond of $20.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

privates.name: Basic Double Bed Private Shared Bathroom
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: FREE WiFi - Parking. Basic Room - Sleeps 1-2 guests in a double bed. Each room has heater, Double Bed, bedding, includes pillows. Communal bathrooms, communal kitchen/ lounge/dining area in next building. $5 fee for Kitchen basket, refundable bond $20.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

privates.name: Superior Double Bed Private Ensuite
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: FREE WiFi - FREE Parking next to the unit. Self Contained Motel sleeping 1-2 guests. A compact serviced Studio room with a queen size bed. Each room has its own private balcony, settee, Sky TV, bathroom, linen, towels and kitchenette.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

If you cancel after 23:59 24th Nov 2025 (NZDT) or in the event of a no-show, your deposit will not be refunded and the total of the first night's accommodation will be charged to your payment card, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information). Please note that cancellations must be made directly within your booking in My Account.
